item.description:
After a break last month, we're back to talk about using images in your WordPress site. We'll cover resizing photos in Photoshop (with a discussion about file size, types, and image size), inserting images into a post, creating galleries, and using featured images & the Image post format.

The first half of the meetup will be very beginner-friendly, the only assumptions are that you have Photoshop (or another photo-editing software) & a WordPress site. For developers, the last part of the presentation will cover how to support featured images and/or image post formats in your themes.

So join us at Skytemple Design, March 28th at 7pm!

View recaps of past meetups on our website, and listen for announcements via twitter, @valleysummit.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Using Images in WordPress
